p: In this context, plants have also developed a tight interaction between ROS and NO as a mechanism to reduce the deleterious consequences of these ROS-induced oxidative injuries. NO orchestrates a wide range of mechanisms leading to the preservation of redox homeostasis in plants. Consequently, NO at low concentration is considered a broad-spectrum anti-stress molecule ( Lamattina et al., 2003; Tossi et al., 2009; Correa-Aragunde et al., 2015). Figure 1 shows the relationship among the different GHG and their impact on plants.
